about_the_game:
Devil Seeds is a game that mixes horror and RPG.

The story takes place on a ghost island, where the player must survive and uncover the mysteries of the place through battles, exploration and solving puzzles.

On the journey, the protagonist duo will acquire new skills, meet scary (or friendly) creatures and discover more about that terrible place and even worse, about themselves.

What to expect?

- Survival Horror mechanics such as exploration, puzzle solving and file investigation.

- RPG mechanics, such as turn-based battles, character progression, level and resource farming.

— Rewarding exploration, where the player can interact and investigate almost everything around them.

— Two funny protagonists

— Rich and enigmatic plot.

- 3 cute cats. (or not.)

The game will be divided into chapters, which will be released as they are ready.
